Title: Provides that all local elections shall be in an even-numbered year; repealer
Summary: Provides that all local, village, town, county and city of New York elections shall be in an even-numbered year.
LawCode: Amd §§6-202 & 15-104, rpld §6-200, El L; amd §80, Town L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law and the town law, in relation to elections; and to repeal section 6-200 of the election law relating to village elections
